label: axiom-boundary-regularity
name: Boundary Regularity
statement:
*   **Core Assumption:** The marginal probability of a single walker becoming invalid after the perturbation and status update stages must be a smooth (Hölder continuous) function of the initial N-particle swarm state. This axiom applies to any valid noise measure, including those with state-dependent coupling between walkers.
